title: New Champion - Tippical Oshaynic
body:
Passive: Cannot upgrade trinket, ever.

Q: (Passive) Spreading Nearsight: Perpetual Nearsight. Subsequent levels affect one additional ally at random.

W: Re-enact (NO COOLDOWN): Recreate exact scenario that caused previous death. Re-enact will cast every 30/25/20/15/10 seconds, if not cast by player, from first death onward.

E: (Passive/Global) Heavy: All allies' movement speed reduced by 10/15/20/25/30% and take 5/10/15/20/25% increased damage.

R: Anchor (NO COOLDOWN): Donate 100/150/200/250/300 gold to closest enemy Champion. Gold taken from random ally's gold pool. 100/150/200/250/300 damage taken for each unit of gold taken. Anchor is cast every 30 seconds, if not cast by player.

BACKGROUND:

Coming soon...

replies.body:
Good joke, would fit my playstyle well.
 {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
